articles.description: The Cabinet Office says the move is "by mutual agreement" but it follows months of negative media reports about his performance.

articles.description: The parents of two children who say they warned nursery staff about Chan tell the BBC they felt ignored.
articles.title: 'We warned nursery about abuser Vincent Chan - they dismissed us,' parents tell BBC

articles.description: General Synod did vote to continue to look at the issue, but bishops say there are "theological and legal barriers" to having such ceremonies now.
articles.title: Church of England abandons proposals for same-sex blessing ceremonies

articles.title: Iran fortifies underground complex near nuclear site, satellite images show

articles.title: Lorry driver who made guns and prepared for 'race war' is jailed

articles.title: Aberdeen finally sees sunshine for first time since 21 January

articles.title: Tell parents if pupils question gender at school, government says
